column4: I'm using Jaunty and Flash either needs exclusive control over all audio to work. If I'm watching a file on YouTube I can't play MP3s and if I'm listening to MP3s I can't hear a flash video. Does anyone know of a fix?
no from my knowledge that is a bug in firefox, not flash
So if i used another browser like Opera I wouldn't experience the flash sound bug?
from what i understand, try googling it, it should be on launchpad
